title: Request to make URF playable again
body:
I can't ban Wukong Skarner Sona Shaco and Hecarim every game(I know I'm forgetting at least one), and when there isn't a ban on them, 90% chance you have to fight them.  People don't want to simply have fun, they want to pick the most broken thing possible, crush the enemy team, and sit behind the nexus taunting and dancing.  This was such a great thing before the standard community of entitled raging trolls got involved, but now everyone's being an asshole just like normals, picking the same broken champs every game just like normals, and refusing to surrender and move on to the next game just like normals.

If I wanted to deal with all that, I'd just play normals :P

So, can you auto ban the most ridiculous champs again?  That would at least solve one of the issues.  The other probably will never be solved since Riot seems to think that treating everyone you meet like garbage is acceptable behavior.
